TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageStatePersister extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 视图状态持久性机制提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for ASP.NET view state persistence mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 请求和响应是本质上是无状态。The HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 要保持 HTTP 请求之间的状态信息，ASP.NET 服务器页可以将存储状态。To maintain state information between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此状态，称为视图状态，它包含的页面和控件设置使页和控件显示就像它们是相同的用户所看到并与之交互其最后一个往返行程到服务器的数据。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the server. 有几种机制来存储到同一页上的连续请求之间的视图状态。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. 抽象类表示这些状态信息存储机制的基类。The abstract class represents the base class for these state information storage mechanisms. 在 ASP.NET 中的默认视图状态持久性机制是维护作为 Base64 编码字符串中隐藏的 HTML 元素的状态信息 (具有的元素`type`属性设置为`"hidden"`) 页上。The default view state persistence mechanism in ASP.NET is to maintain the state information as a Base64-encoded string in a hidden HTML element (an element with the `type` attribute set to `"hidden"`) on the page. ASP.NET 页使用对象执行此工作，并使用实例进行序列化和反序列化对象的状态信息。An ASP.NET page uses a object to perform this work, using an instance to serialize and deserialize object state information. 或者，可以将视图状态存储在页服务器使用的对象移动客户端提供有限的带宽和资源的类。Alternately, you can store the view state for your pages in the object on the server using the class for mobile clients with limited bandwidth and resources. 在某些情况下，你可以完全禁用视图状态持续性。In some cases, you might disable view state persistence altogether. 如果你这样做，则结果是，有时页面和依赖于状态持久性的控件执行操作的行为正确。If you do this, the result is that sometimes pages and controls that rely on state persistence do not behave correctly. 有关页状态管理和视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about page state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 如果你正在编写控件，你可以存储中的控件的状态信息字典，这是对象。If you are writing controls, you can store state information for the controls in the dictionary, which is a object. 开发人员将检索的控件状态通过属性。A developer would retrieve the control state through the property. 分配键和值到属性，与对象序列化请求之间的状态信息。You assign keys and values to the property, and the object serializes the state information between requests. 若要执行自定义控件中处理的状态，重写和方法。To perform custom state handling in your control, override the and methods. 在页开发人员禁用了视图状态时，此字典中存储任何状态信息将丢失。Any state information that is stored in this dictionary is lost when view state is disabled by a page developer. 若要缓解此问题，在 ASP.NET 中可以将关键状态信息存储在单独的对象，调用控件状态的 2.0 版。To mitigate this, in ASP.NET version 2.0 you can store critical state information in a separate object, called control state. 页开发人员可以通过禁用了视图状态时，不是受影响的控件状态对象。The control state object is not affected when view state is disabled by a page developer. 将状态信息存储中的控件状态对象需要控件重写和方法并且已注册控件来存储中的状态信息控制状态，每次初始化控件。Storing state information in the control state object requires that the control override the and methods and that the control be registered to store state information in control state every time the control is initialized. 你可以将控件注册为使用通过重写控件状态方法并调用方法。You can register a control to use control state by overriding the method and calling the method. 有关使用属性和控件状态时开发控件，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information about using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). 要保持在上的视图状态无法支持现有客户端视图状态持久性机制中，你可以扩展类引入你自己的视图状态持久性方法，并可以使用页适配器配置 ASP.NET 应用程序若要使用不同的视图状态持久性机制基于客户端向其提供的页面的类型。To maintain view state on clients that cannot support the existing view state persistence mechanisms, you can extend the class to introduce your own view state persistence methods, and you can use page adapters to configure your ASP.NET application to use different view state persistence mechanisms based on the type of client to which a page is served. 派生自的类类必须重写抽象方法以在持久性介质存储视图状态和控件状态，并重写方法以将它解压缩。Classes that derive from the class must override the abstract method to store view state and control state in the persistence medium, and override the method to extract it. 如果你需要将序列化为视图状态，以及为字符串的控件状态，则可以使用访问时使用的对象属性。If you need to serialize view state and control state to a string, you can use the object that is accessed using the property. 它有效地序列化和反序列化对象为 Base64 编码字符串的状态信息。It efficiently serializes and deserializes object state information to a Base64-encoded string. 你也可以替代属性来提供自己的对象状态序列化机制。You can also override the property to supply your own object state serialization mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建将查看和控制的状态保存在 Web 服务器的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object that saves view and control state on the Web server. `StreamPageStatePersister`演示如何重写和方法来提取和保存视图状态信息。The `StreamPageStatePersister` demonstrates how to override the and methods to extract and save view state information. 因为与自适应呈现和客户端功能相关的状态持久性机制`MyPageAdapter`类可用于激活`StreamPageStatePersister`ASP.NET 应用程序。Because the state persistence mechanisms are related to adaptive rendering and client capabilities, the `MyPageAdapter` class is provided to activate the `StreamPageStatePersister` for an ASP.NET application. 最后，浏览器功能 (.browser) 文件用于启用`MyPageAdapter`适配器 （在此情况下，默认 Web 浏览器） 的客户端的特定类。Finally, a browser capabilities (.browser) file is provided to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter for a specific class of clients (in this case, the default Web browser). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建返回的实例的类`StreamPageStatePersister`，用于保留视图和控件的 ASP.NET Web 页的状态。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class that returns an instance of `StreamPageStatePersister`, which is used to persist view and control state for an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#5)] 将这两个类编译为可用于运行示例，使用以下编译器命令行程序集。Compile these two classes into an assembly that you can use to run a sample, using the following compiler command line. 确保编译的程序集是在下方的 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录的 \Bin 目录中。Ensure that the compiled assembly is in the \Bin directory underneath the ASP.NET application root. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#6)] 最后，若要启用`MyPageAdapter`适配器，你必须创建一个名为 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录下的浏览器目录，并且包括包含配置信息的.browser 文件。Finally, to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter, you must create a directory named Browsers underneath the ASP.NET application root, and include a .browser file with configuration information. ``配置文件中的元素指示配置替代为默认浏览器 Default.browser 配置文件中指定的值。The `` element in the configuration file indicates that the configuration overrides the values specified for the default browser in the Default.browser configuration file. 在此示例中，`MyPageAdapter`用于 ASP.NET Web 页 （其中通常未适配器使用）。In this example, `MyPageAdapter` is used for ASP.NET Web pages (where normally no adapter is used). ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是组成关键的视图状态数据的 Web 服务器控件需要给函数，以及包含在一个单独的对象中的普通视图状态信息的对象。Control state is an object comprised of critical view state data that Web server controls need to function, and is contained in a separate object from normal view state information. 在禁用了视图状态时，不受影响的控件状态数据级别，但需要额外的实现步骤才能使用。Control state data is not affected when view state is disabled at the level, but requires extra implementation steps to use. 有关详细信息使用属性和控件状态时开发控件，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类初始化属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中，属性赋予字段对象，并使用序列化类。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the class. 当调用方法时，类用于反序列化视图状态和控制状态信息和从生成初始化属性对象的字段。When the method is called, the class is used to deserialize view state and control state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在 对象初始化其控件层次结构时，由派生类重写以反序列化并加载保留的状态信息。

span.span: Overridden by derived classes to deserialize and load persisted state information when a object initializes its control hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类类实现方法以初始化和从某种保留的格式的属性。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to initialize the and properties from some persisted format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类实现方法以从持久性介质中加载视图状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to load view state from a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister`尝试从流中读取数据。The `StreamPageStatePersister` attempts to read data from a stream. 它使用对象反序列化的视图状态数据和初始化属性和属性，该页面用于初始化控件属性。It uses an object to deserialize view state data and initialize the property and the property, which a page uses to initialize controls. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类类实现方法以保留的内容和持久性介质中的属性。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to persist the contents of the and properties to a persistence medium. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类实现方法以保留到持久性介质中的视图状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to persist view state to a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister`使用要序列化的内容对象属性和属性。The `StreamPageStatePersister` uses an object to serialize the contents of the property and property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写属性，以提供您自己的视图状态格式化程序。You can override the property to provide your own view state formatter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类访问属性，以检索对象，它是默认实现的接口来序列化视图状态和控制状态设置为流。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class accesses the property to retrieve an object, which is the default implementation of the interface, to serialize view state and control state to a stream. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是 Web 服务器控件需要函数和呈现自身的状态数据的字典。View state is a dictionary of state data that Web server controls need to function and render themselves. 控件开发人员通常访问视图状态的对象使用属性。Control developers typically access the view state object using the property. 视图状态时在禁用了视图状态受到影响级别，并因此导致控件可能无法正确工作在这些情况下。View state is affected when view state is disabled at the level, and as a result controls might not behave correctly in these scenarios. 有关详细信息使用和控制状态开发控件时，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类初始化属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中，属性赋予字段对象，并使用序列化对象，它是实例的接口。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the object, which is an instance of the interface. 当调用方法时，接口用于反序列化视图状态信息和从生成初始化属性对象的字段。When the method is called, the interface is used to deserialize view state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]
